entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
